div.div:
nc -p 44410 172.21.206.198 7777
# When receive FIN, reply ACK only(do not close socket immediately)

div.div:
syscall shutdown(socketFD, ENVOY_SHUT_WR) just close the write channel and keep read channel(Half-Close TCP).
FIN_WAIT_2 will never timeout
. Will not timeout by tcp_fin_timeout.

switch.text: syscall shutdown(socketFD, ENVOY_SHUT_WR) just close the write channel and keep read channel(Half-Close TCP)....

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 738px; height: 1px; padding-top: 106px; margin-left: 782px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(102, 102, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
tcp 6 54(expire seconds)
CLOSE_WAIT
src=172.29.73.7 dst=172.21.206.198 sport=
44410
dport=7777 src=127.0.0.1 dst=172.29.73.7 sport=15001 dport=
44410
[ASSURED] mark=0 use=1
tcp 6 54 CLOSE_WAIT src=172.29.73.7 dst=172.21.206.198 sport=38072 dport=7777 src=172.21.206.198 dst=172.29.73.7 sport=7777 dport=38072 [ASSURED] mark=0 use=1

switch.text: tcp 6 54(expire seconds) CLOSE_WAIT src=172.29.73.7 dst=172.21.206.198 sport=44410 dport=7777 src=127.0.0.1 dst=172.29.73....

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
